name: PatSnap
desc: 133 million patents from 116 jurisdictions with market leading Asia coverage. Update frequency; daily.
employees: Nine on alt. data specifically, over 700 globally
full_sector_coverage: All Sectors, patents are particularly strong in Pharma, Medical Devices, Semi-Conductors, Automotive and Energy
pricing_structure: Data usage model for API. Per user pricing for aggregates GUI
why_us?: To assess company and industry innovation trends
advantages: Market-leading Asia Pacific Data, Update Frequency and Entity mapping algorithm
use_cases: Understand a companies innovation strategy, both on industry and country level.
